sect1.title: #IF

row.entry: The Template statements to execute if the condition is true.
Optional. Provides structure for statements to execute if its condition is true.
Optional. Provides structure for statements to execute if the condition is false.
Optional. The Template statements to execute if the condition is false.

sect1.para: The #IF structure evaluates the condition and executes either the truestatements or falsestatements (if present). This statement may be used outside an XML scope and does not require a previous LOADXML to instantiate an XML scope.
